entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call may be recorded for quality assurance. Please state the reason for your call.
Yeah, hi. I need to return this VeloBand Pulse I bought. It's not working right and I'm not happy with it.
Okay, I understand. I can certainly help you with that. Can I get your order number or the email address associated with the purchase, please?
Thank you. Let me pull that up for you. Okay, I see your order here. You purchased the VeloBand Pulse on [date of purchase - 15 days prior to call]. I understand you'd like to initiate a return.
Yes! I want to return it. This thing is a piece of junk! It keeps losing my heart rate. What's the point of a VeloBand Pulse if it can't track my pulse properly?!

I apologize you're having trouble with the device. I'm looking at our return policy, and unfortunately, the return window for the VeloBand Pulse is 10 days from the date of purchase. Since it has been 15 days, a standard return for a refund isn’t possible.
What?! Seriously? That's ridiculous! I just bought this thing! 10 days? Who does that? I want my money back!

I understand your frustration, and I am sorry for the inconvenience. While a full refund isn’t possible due to the return window, let me explore some options for you. While this falls outside the standard policy, I can check if a policy exception can be made.
A policy exception? What does that even mean? Just give me my money back! I'm a loyal customer. I've bought tons of stuff from you guys.

I appreciate your loyalty, and I want to make things right. Unfortunately, I've checked and I can't authorize a full refund as it falls outside of our return policy, however, I can offer you store credit for the full purchase amount of the VeloBand Pulse. This credit can be used towards any other product on our site.
Store credit? So I'm stuck buying something else from you guys? I guess that's better than nothing. Is there an expiration date on the credit?

No, there is no expiration date. The store credit will be available on your account and ready to use whenever you find something you like. Would you like me to go ahead and process the store credit for you?

Perfect. I've just processed the store credit. You should see it reflected in your account within the next few minutes. You can use it immediately on our website or through our app. Also, regarding the VeloBand Pulse itself, even though you can't return it, have you tried resetting it to factory settings or updating the firmware? Sometimes that resolves connectivity issues. We have troubleshooting steps available on our website.
Oh, I didn't even think about that. I'll try that first before buying something else. Thanks.
You're very welcome! I'm happy I could assist you. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for your help... even if I didn't get a full refund, this is better than nothing.
You're very welcome! Thank you for being a VeloFit customer. Have a great day!
